name: View Dashboard
description: Allows users to view the website dashboard.

name: Manage Orders
description: Allows users to manage pizza orders

name: View Customers
description: Allows administrators to view a list of customers who have booked tours.

name: Edit Customers
description: Allows administrators to edit customer information and booking details.

name: Delete Customers
description: Allows administrators to delete customer records from the website.

name: View restaurants
description: Allows users to view information about restaurants on the website.

name: Create restaurants
description: Allows administrators to create new restaurant listings on the website.

name: Edit restaurants
description: Allows administrators to edit information about existing restaurants on the website.

name: Delete restaurants
description: Allows administrators to delete restaurant listings from the website.
